title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5002.3 - Payment for previous service for members with a date of membership on or after July 27, 1976, but before September 1, 1983, who are eligible to purchase such service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5002.3 - Payment for previous service for members with a date of membership on or after July 27, 1976, but before September 1, 1983, who are eligible to purchase such service

State Regulations
(a) The
amount of money to be paid for previous service which was originally credited
under a membership dated prior to July 27, 1976 (Tier I or II) shall be three
percent of wages earned for such service. (b) The amount of money to be paid for
previous service which was originally credited under a former membership dated
on or after July 27, 1976 but before September 1, 1983 (Tier III), shall be
three percent of wages earned for such service, together with interest from the
date of such service through the date of repayment at the rate of five percent
per annum compounded annually. (c) The amount of money to be paid for previous service which was not previously
credited in a public retirement system in New York State which predates the
entry in the retirement system, pursuant to paragraphs (i) and (ii) of
subdivision b of section
513
of the Retirement and Social Security

Law, shall be three percent of wages earned for such
service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5002.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
